text_blocks.content: Jeffrey Epstein From (b)(6), (b)(7)(C-)(Reuters) To Lee Plourde Date 2019/08/10 09:48 Subject: Jeffrey Epstein Attachments: TEXT.htm, Mime.822

Hello Lee, I am a reporter with Reuters and am reaching out to seek to confirm that Jeffrey Epstein died of suicide at your facility. If this is true can you say approximately when he died and how he committed suicide? I can be reached at (646) 200(b)(6) Thanks, (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Journalist for Thomson Reuters Los Angeles Bureau Mobile: (+1) 646-200-(b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Follow me online at: @AdobReports

additional_notes: The document is an email with some redacted information. The redactions are marked with (b)(6) and (b)(7)(C).
